members.joinCircumstances: Smoker transferred to G-5 after the timeskip, requesting this posting to be closer to his targets in the New World.
Tashigi was promoted to Captain and transferred to G-5 with Smoker.
Member of the G-5 unit serving under Smoker.
Member of the G-5 unit serving under Smoker.

keyMoments.title: G-5 Marines Patrol New World Entrance
keyMoments.description: Vice Admiral Smoker and the G-5 Marines intercept pirates fleeing from Fish-Man Island and entering the New World.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the G-5 as the first line of defense in the New World and sets up their role in upcoming arcs.

bases.description: A Marine base located in the New World near the Red Line, known for having problematic marines according to Aokiji.

keyMoments.title: Pekoms Confronts Caribou
keyMoments.description: Big Mom Pirates member Pekoms demonstrates the crew's power by easily defeating Caribou who tried to reclaim his treasure.
keyMoments.significance: Showcases the strength of Big Mom's crew members and establishes them as New World-level threats.

keyMoments.title: Big Mom Pirates Receive Tamate Box
keyMoments.description: Pekoms and Baron Tamago successfully collect the Tamate Box treasure from Fish-Man Island for Big Mom, unknowingly receiving a booby-trapped box.
keyMoments.significance: Sets up a major plot point that will have consequences in the Whole Cake Island arc.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a pirate hat with a wide smile and flames on either side
